typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Player as string,
		Time as string,
		Points as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> BlobGameStore
BlobGameStore select(mapColumn(
		PlayerName = Player,
		TimeSpend = Time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsFromSource
SelectedColumnsFromSource sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		Player as string,
		Time as string,
		Points as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Player = PlayerName,
		Time = TimeSpend
	)) ~> sink1
